'''Flying Hatter's Trick''' is a subevent during [[Summertide Scales and Tales]].

It is unlocked after completing the {{Quest|"Flying Hatter"}} and can be accessed from the {{Icon|Flying Hatter's Trick}} icon.

===I: A Light Glimmer===
Unlocks 2024-07-19 04{{Colon}}00

;Gamemode Details
* In this mode, Flying Hats can attract {{Color|BP|up to}} 1 toy figure at once. Continually attract toy figures within the allotted time to {{Color|BP|build up your combo}}.
* The {{Color|BP|higher your combo}}, the {{Color|BP|more points}} you'll get each time you attract a toy figure.
* Attracting Explosive Barrels or failing to attract any toy figures will zero out your combo. Attracting Explosive Barrels will also deduct points from your score.

===II - Goodly Gathering===
Unlocks 2024-07-21 04{{Colon}}00

;Scoring Rules
{|class="article-table tdc"

;Gamemode Details
* In this mode, Flying Hats can attract {{Color|#e36000|up to 4}} toy figures at once. Each time they attract 2/3/4 toy figures with the same clothes at once, you'll earn different amounts of bonus points.
* You have {{Color|BP|15 chances}} to attract toy figures. After all attempts have been used, the game will end. The more toy figures with the same clothes you attract at once, the more bonus points you'll earn.
* If you attract an Explosive Barrel, you will not gain any points no matter how many identically dressed figures you attracted. You will not gain any bonus points, but will instead lose a certain amount.

;Gamemode Details
* In this mode, every stage has {{Color|BP|4 rounds}}. When each begins, the clothes of the toy figures will be briefly displayed, before they and the items will be covered by the Gift Boxes.
* During each round, after attracting all the toy figures with the same clothes, you will earn a certain amount of bonus points
* When all toy figures with the same clothes have been attracted, you will earn bonus points for each Gift Box still on the board
